entry.title: $2600 // NO FEE Beautiful Apartment in Prime Neighborhood (utilities included)
entry.content:
Ideal apartment drenched with sunlight in Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Steps from the botanical gardens, Prospect Park, and the express Q train that reaches Manhattan in 15 minutes. Beautifully furnished with a fully prepared kitchen, iron, hairdryer, linens and towels, memory foam mattress, WiFi, TV with Chromecast - essentially arrive with your bags and everything you need is provided. The apartment is exceptionally quite and large. Cats, dogs, and children are welcome. Rent includes heat, hot water, Wifi, and cooking gas. Renter pays electric bill.

NO BROKERS FEE - first month rent and a one month refundable security deposit to move in. The apartment is available from February 1, 2019 to February 30, 2010 with possible extension.

Rent reduction for longer term rental.
1-4 months: $2800
5-8 months: $2700
9-12 months: $2600

Call to schedule a showing.
